channel.title: BATCH help. Need a batch expert
channel.description:
How would I go about creating a new file using batch. So that when the batch file is run, it create a new file called lets say 'Solum.txt'.
Also, how would I go about changing the content of said file?
If anyone could help that would be great.
Syrillia.

item.title: BATCH help. Need a batch expert
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Elaborate. I’ve never done this before.

Read full topic
item.source: BATCH help. Need a batch expert

item.title: BATCH help. Need a batch expert
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

He’s talking about what you call a buffer writer/reader.
It writes information to a text file, and reads it.

I always thought that was on a server though?

Read full topic
item.source: BATCH help. Need a batch expert
